bibl.title: Meretrix regina: Augustan Cleopatras.

bibl.title: Maria WYKE, The Roman Mistress: Ancient and Modern Representations

bibl.seg: WYKE Maria, Meretrix regina: Augustan Cleopatras.
Maria WYKE, The Roman Mistress: Ancient and Modern Representations (Oxford, 2002) pp. 195-243.

Revised and extended version of the contribution published in: Anton POWELL (Ed.), Roman Poetry and Propaganda in the Age of Augustus (Bristol, 1992) pp. 98-140. - See also: EADEM, Oriental Vamp: Cleopatra 1910s, ibidem, pp. 244-278; - Glamour Girl: Cleopatra 1930s-1960s, ibidem, pp. 279-320.
